original_text: The Israelite woman's son said bad things about God. The people took him to Moses. (The name of the mother was Shelomith. She was the daughter of Dibri from the family of Dan.)
korean_text: 그 이스라엘 여인의 아들이 여호와의 이름을 모독하며 저주하므로 무리가 끌고 모세에게로 가니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 슬로밋이요 단 지파 디브리의 딸이었더라

sentences.original_text: The Israelite woman's son said bad things about God
The people took him to Moses
The name of the mother was Shelomith
She was the daughter of Dibri from the family of Dan
